[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IHeftLifecycleHooks](./heft.iheftlifecyclehooks.md) &gt; [clean](./heft.iheftlifecyclehooks.clean.md)

## IHeftLifecycleHooks.clean property

The `clean` hook is called at the beginning of Heft execution. It can be used to clean up any files or folders that may be produced by the plugin. To use it, call `clean.tapPromise(<pluginName>, <callback>)`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clean: AsyncParallelHook<IHeftLifecycleCleanHookOptions>;
```
